import moment from 'moment'; import { useState } from 'react'; import './Modal.scss'; export const Modal = (props) => { const { movie, handleClose } = props const { poster_path, title, overview } = movie return ( <>
{ movie && <>

{overview}

handleClose()}>Close
}
